entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. I'm not happy with it at all.
I understand. I'm sorry to hear you're not satisfied. Can you tell me what item you'd like to return?
It's the VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago, and it just doesn't work like I expected. The heart rate monitor is completely unreliable.
Okay, I understand. Let me check your purchase history. To confirm, you are looking to return the VeloBand Pulse?
Yes! That's exactly it! This stupid smart watch doesn't even track my sleep accurately! I'm wasting my time.

I apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced with the VeloBand Pulse. I see your purchase here. Our return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase. Since you're within that window, we can definitely process a return for you.
90 days? Really? I thought I was going to be stuck with this thing! I was looking all over your website and it was super confusing! Are you sure? It's been, like, 15 days.

Yes, absolutely. Our standard return policy is 90 days. We want you to be completely satisfied with your VeloFit purchase. The specific return policy regarding the VeloBand Pulse is covered by our standard return guidelines. Let's get this return started for you.
Okay, great! What do I need to do?

I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to your email address on file. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, if possible, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll issue a full refund to your original payment method.
Perfect! That sounds easy enough. I was dreading this. Thanks!
You're very welcome! It will take between 7 to 10 days for the refund to reflect in your account after we receive the VeloBand Pulse. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you so much for your help! I appreciate it.
You're very welcome. Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
